MemberPlan.name: MemberPlan
MemberPlan.description: Represents details about the insurance coverage for a member or subscriber.

Affiliation.description: An affiliation to a government service, such as the army or navy.

EffectiveFrom.description: The date from which this member plan is effective.

EffectiveTo.description: The date on which this member plan ceases to be effective.

ExternalIDentifier.description: The identifier used to identify the record outside the Salesforce org.

GroupNumber.description: The group number or policy number of the primary member.

IssuerNumber.description: Reference number for the issuer of the plan.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastVerification.description: The date on which this plan was last verified.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

MemberId.description: The ID of the member’s record.

MemberNumber.description: The member’s reference number for this plan.

Name.description: The name by which the member knows this plan.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PayerId.description: The ID of the payer’s Account object record.

PayerNetworkId.description: The payer insurance plan or network that is associated with the patient. This field is a relationship field.

PlanId.description: Lookup of the Purchaser Plan ID.

PrimaryCarePhysician.description: The name of the physician providing primary care under this plan.

PrimarySecondaryTertiary.description: Whether this plan is the primary, secondary, or tertiary plan.

RelationshipToSubscriber.description: The relationship of this member to the plan’s subscriber. Valid options are: Self Spouse Child Unknown Other Relationship

SourceSystem.description: The name of the system this plan record came from.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The ID of this plan record on its source system.

SourceSystemModified.description: The date on which this plan record was last changed on the source system.

Status.description: Indicates whether the plan is active.

SubscriberId.description: The ID of the subscriber’s record.

VerificationStatus.description: The status of the plan’s verification. Valid options are: Active - Verified Rejected Not Checked Unknown Inactive
